title: Enhancing Medical Practical Competencies: Professional Mathematics Competency Development through Workplace-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and educational field contexts
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Apply and explain at least three mathematical problem-solving strategies required in workplace environments
Mathematically analyze real educational data (student grades, class evaluations, etc.) to propose improvement measures
Collaborate with peer teachers and experts to plan and execute mathematics education-related projects

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
